slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dice 6 Fever introduces the latest HOT & COLD bonuses! Boost your winning chances with payouts up to 18x JACKPOT! Simply bet on numbers 1-6, Big/Small, or Odd/Even.

slide-2.title: Hot & Cold
content: The system randomly assigns bets to Hot and Cold categories. 10 bet types are available: numbers 1-6, Odd/Even, Big/Small. In a single round, all categories may appear together or all bets may fall into the same category.

slide-3.title: Jackpot
content: Bets in the Jackpot category offer significantly higher payouts than normal. Only number bets (1-6) can qualify for the Jackpot, and only one number will be selected.
